name: Arcade Zone
description:
Arcade Zone features all of your favorite arcade and retro games and more! Score big, earn tickets, exchange for gifts, and keep playing. Take on the colorful resident arcade champion to become the ultimate arcade legend!

Unique and Fun Gaming Zones: Classic, Pirate, and Sci-fi. Play through all the games to unlock the Arcade Master Zone for a face-off with the resident arcade legend! "Classic retro video games” incorporated in each zone: Freeway, Atlantis, Megamania, and Kaboom! Beat the retro games and earn old-school patches. Each gaming zone requires you to help the vendor: blend smoothies, flip pizzas, and fry corn-dogs!
